text: Az ahli kitoʙ kase hast, ki agar moli farovone ʙa u amonat dihi, onro ʙa tu ʙozmegardonad; va az [mijoni] onon kase hast, ki agar uro ʙar dinore amin ʙisumori, onro ʙa tu ʙoznamegardonad; magar on ki pajvasta ʙar [darjofti] on istodagi kuni. In ʙad-on xotir ast, ki onon megujand: "Dar mavridi [xurdani amvoli] qavmi araʙ, gunohe ʙar mo nest"; va [ʙad-in guna onon] dar hole ki [haqiqatro] medonand, ʙar Alloh taolo duruƣ meʙandand
